title: President Donald J. Trump Is Taking A Historic Step To Achieve Peace In Afghanistan And Bring Our Troops Home – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
February 29, 2020
We are working to finally end America’s longest war and bring our troops back home.
						President Donald J. Trump					PATHWAY TO PEACE IN AFGHANISTAN: President Donald J. Trump is following through on his promise and taking a decisive step to achieve negotiated peace in Afghanistan.
